non_cve_findings.message: Detected a template variable used in an anchor tag with the 'href' attribute. This allows a malicious actor to input the 'javascript:' URI and is subject to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks.
Detected SQL statement that is tainted by user-input. This could lead to SQL injection if variables in the SQL statement are not properly sanitized.
Missing CSRF protection middleware. This could allow attackers to perform actions on behalf of authenticated users.

recommendations: Increase concurrency or disable heavy modules for near real-time execution

enhanced_decision.summary: Consensus REVIEW at 72.3% confidence across 1456 findings.
